testcase.name: Verifies that the file to be uploaded meets user requirement
Verifies that the provided token is valid
Verifies that at the beginning the user shall not have any existing file associated with it
Error Scenario - Verifies that an error is thrown when the file is missing in the request
Error Scenario - Verifies that an error is thrown and user shall not be upload file with an invalid token
Error Scenario - Verifies that an error is thrown and user shall not be upload file without a token
Verifies that the user shall be able to upload a PNG file
Verifies that the file object has all the expected thumb URLs
Error Scenario - Verifies that an error is thrown if token is not provided in the request
Error Scenario - Verifies that an error is thrown if an invalid token is provided in the request
Error Scenario - Verifies that an error is thrown if a token is provided with an invalid user in the request
Verifies that file data is not available if the "types" of the file is set to any valid value except "images"
Verifies that "types = all" returns a default file object and does not filter the list
Verifies that setting "types" to any invalid value results in default file object
Verifies that a valid successful file.list request with type "images" returns a valid file object
Verifies that the returned file object in file.list request matches the id and values of the uploaded file
Error Scenario - Verifies an error is thrown if a non existing/invalid file id is passed in file.delete request
Error Scenario - Verifies that an error is thrown and the user shall not be able to delete a file is an invalid token is passed to the request
Error Scenario - Verifies that an error is thrown and the user shall not be able to delete a file when token is not passed to the request
Verifies that the user shall be able to delete file with a valid request
Error Scenario - Verifies an error is thrown if a deleted file id is passed in file.delete request
Verifies that file object is returned empty in file.list request after the file is deleted
